explain: Speed camera not working in Handsworth, Birmingham, for over 2 years; house owners should be aware of potential risk of speeding motorists as the camera was previously used to enforce the 30mph limit.

The bright yellow Gatso speed camera, which previously enforced the 30mph speed limit in Handsworth, Birmingham, has not been functioning for over two years due to all its fixed devices being turned off in the West Midlands. Consequently, smaller mobile units have been introduced to replace it.
The council might remove the non-functional speed camera in Birmingham, as they are aware of its re-pointing, but the situation is unclear at the moment.
